text: Lyubka Debarlieva (born 21 September 1980) is an Bulgarian volleyball player. She played at the 2002 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Championship, 2005 Women's European Volleyball Championship, 2007 Women's European Volleyball Championship, 2009 Women's European Volleyball Championship, and 2011 Women's European Volleyball Championship. She played for Levski Volley, Lokomotiv Baku, and Leningradka Saint Petersburg. == References == Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian volleyball players
title: Lyubka Debarlieva
